body:
Hello,

New here to the Avicus Network.

Many of you may know me from other servers, but for those who don't, let me introduce myself:
  • About me: Male, friendly, competitive, music lover, and I live in the United States.
  • How I found Avicus: I heard about it a long time ago, but I was never that interested at the time. Now though, a friend of my invited me to play in an upcoming tournament for Avicus, that's how I first joined the server.
  • My favorite game mode on Avicus: DTM, this is where you'll usually find me playing.
  • Why my name is ID10: I get asked this sometimes, so allow me to explain. My original name was "lavablock12345", I wanted to change it to "LavaBlock", but unfortunately that name was unavailable. So, I changed it to ID10 after many name changes. 10 is the ID for Lava in Minecraft, so feel free to call me by lava or ID.
See ya around,

ID10

Welcome to the server! Hope to see you on our teamspeak hanging with others, I'm sure you'll have a great time.

Cya

replies.body: Welcome to Avicus! Enjoy you stay :) Also, make sure to check out Avi's PlugDJ It's a fun place to listen, and share your music with other players.

replies.body: Welcome! I thought you were trying to go for a funny name (ID10T), but it was already taken. Anyways, have a good time here!
